alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 7:26PM CDT until August 27 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fayette County in northeastern Iowa... Southwestern Winneshiek County in northeastern Iowa... Southeastern Chickasaw County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 725 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tripoli, or 11 miles south of New Hampton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fredericksburg around 735 PM CDT. Lawler around 745 PM CDT. Waucoma around 755 PM CDT. Fort Atkinson around 805 PM CDT. Spillville around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Festina, Eldorado, Boyd, Williamstown, Richfield, St. Lucas and County Roads B 54 And V 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
